Polydermal Graft

  1. Post WotC: Allied Crossplay
    CNA-Encoded Armory     [Source: World|Strike FAQ]
    As of this (FAQ's) writing, the only Upgrades that can be returned from the scrap pile via CNA-Encoded Armory are the following:

    • Body Armor

    • Covert Armor

    • Polydermal Graft (Wave BFA)

    • Power Sword
